description: All agents have the same number of activities (39), which is unusual and may indicate a lack of diversity in task distribution or a reporting error.

description: API latency is significantly higher (61.036253929138184) compared to other performance metrics like CPU and memory usage (41.036253929138184). This could indicate a bottleneck or inefficiency in the API handling.
